response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and valuable, with an intrinsic worth of over $8,000 to me. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests. To make this offer more appealing, I am willing to extend it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is a fantastic chance to acquire something of great value at a slightly discounted rate. I look forward to your response and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial arrangement.", "product_price": 7500}
